TEXAS TECH.notes: New OC Mack Leftwich runs Veer-and-Shoot. Prioritizing mobile pocket passer profile (Brendan Sorsby).

OKLA STATE.notes: New HC Eric Morris is a Mike Leach disciple. Pure Air Raid system requires Pocket Managers.

MISSISSIPPI.notes: Lane Kiffin's offense typically favors high-processing Pocket Managers.

INDIANA.notes: Curt Cignetti / Mike Shanahan offense. Keeping consistent with previous year.
